outline.title: Your Doctorate Awaits
outline.summary: Title slide introducing the webinar and Dr. Lesley Poinsette.

outline.title: The Challenge Facing Ministry Leaders
outline.summary: Highlights the barriers ministry leaders face in pursuing doctoral education.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/8ZCfiNkcfyNZ.jpg - Image 4 shows a man in clerical attire holding a book, representing a ministry leader facing a challenge or aspiration. It fits the theme of ministry leaders and their pursuit of advanced education.

outline.title: PICU: Built for Your Life
outline.summary: Explains how PICU solves the problems of cost, schedule, and flexibility.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/8llTIYlGDTd0.jpg; /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/82RaPqa1lol1.webp - Images 7 and 8 show people (adult and child) using laptops for online learning, which visually supports the concept of 100% online, self-paced, and accessible education that PICU offers.

outline.title: Our Doctoral Programs
outline.summary: Overview of the four doctoral programs and dual degree options.

outline.title: Doctor of Divinity
outline.summary: Details the D.Div. in Chaplaincy and Pastoral Care program.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/NxtbR7sTXmWN.jpg - Image 1 shows an illustration of a counseling/pastoral care setting with a cross, which is highly relevant to the Doctor of Divinity in Chaplaincy and Pastoral Care program.

outline.title: PhD in Practical Ministry
outline.summary: Details the PhD in Practical Ministry program.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/HVsll2gTpJT7.jpg - Image 12 shows a group in a meeting/leadership setting, which aligns with the content for the PhD in Practical Ministry, focusing on leadership, church growth, and administration.

outline.title: PhD in Christian Counseling
outline.summary: Details the PhD in Christian Counseling program.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/MNmJj4bWAn1q.jpg - Image 2 shows a couple and a counselor in a session, directly illustrating the Christian Counseling program content about serving individuals, couples, and families.

outline.title: PhD in Christian Entrepreneurship
outline.summary: Details the PhD in Christian Entrepreneurship program.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/QPbJCtzv4A8D.jpg - Image 15 shows a professional woman working on a laptop, which can represent the integration of business/entrepreneurship and faith, especially in a modern, marketplace context.

outline.title: Dual Degree Programs
outline.summary: Explains the value of the dual degree option (Master's + PhD).

outline.title: PICU vs. Traditional Programs
outline.summary: Comparison table showing PICU's advantages in tuition and flexibility.

outline.title: Student Success Story
outline.summary: Testimonial from Pastor Michael T. about his experience.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/couZUXjhC74u.jpg - Image 16 shows a professional woman smiling while working on a laptop, conveying success, professionalism, and the ability to study while continuing ministry, fitting the success story theme.

outline.title: How It Works
outline.summary: Three simple steps to apply, enroll, and start learning.

outline.title: Timeline and Flexibility
outline.summary: Visualizes the flexible timeline options from 6 to 36 months.

outline.title: What You Will Receive
outline.summary: Lists the tangible outcomes: diploma, transcripts, title of Doctor.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/ztuLOTa6iKgu.jpg - Image 3 shows a graduate in a doctoral gown holding a diploma, which perfectly illustrates the achievement and receipt of the doctoral diploma and title.

outline.title: Addressing Your Concerns
outline.summary: Answers common questions about timing, balance, and investment.

outline.title: Your Next Step
outline.summary: Call to action with contact info and application link.

outline.title: Thank You & Q&A
outline.summary: Closing slide with contact details and Q&A invitation.
